components.data: Set up the following reaction on ice. PCR amplication consists of 4.5ul 10*PCR buffer,0.25 mM of each dNTP,10 uM of each primers, 5 ul of template DNA, and 1.5 units of Taq DNA polymerase, and sterile Tris-distilled water,to a total volume of 25 ul.
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Set up the following reaction on ice. PCR amplication consists of 4.5ul 10*PCR buffer,0.25 mM of each dNTP,10 uM of each primers, 5 ul of template DNA, and 1.5 units of Taq DNA polymerase, and sterile Tris-distilled water,to a total volume of 25 ul.

components.data: PCR amplication  was carried out in a Tetrad Thermal Cycle. Each sample was amplified for 5 min at 94℃and 30 cycles, with each cycle consisting of denaturation at 94℃ for 30 sec, annealing at 58℃ for 30 sec, extension at 72℃ for 1 min, and final extension for 10 min.
components.name: Section

source_data.section: PCR amplication  was carried out in a Tetrad Thermal Cycle. Each sample was amplified for 5 min at 94℃and 30 cycles, with each cycle consisting of denaturation at 94℃ for 30 sec, annealing at 58℃ for 30 sec, extension at 72℃ for 1 min, and final extension for 10 min.

components.data: The amplified products were then electrophoresed on 1.5% agarose gel in Tris-acetate buffer (40 mM Tris acetate, 1 mM EDTA, pH8.0). The products were visualized with ethidium bromide by UV transillumination.
components.name: Section

source_data.section: The amplified products were then electrophoresed on 1.5% agarose gel in Tris-acetate buffer (40 mM Tris acetate, 1 mM EDTA, pH8.0). The products were visualized with ethidium bromide by UV transillumination.
